abstract: Boxing Writers Assn of America nominates lightweight Terence Crawford as the 2014 fighter of the year.
lead_paragraph: Crawford, a lightweight who won three fights in 2014, was voted fighter of the year by the Boxing Writers Association of America.

headline.main: American Terence Crawford Named Fighter of the Year
headline.print_headline: American Named Fighter of the Year

snippet: Crawford, a lightweight who won three fights in 2014, was voted fighter of the year by the Boxing Writers Association of America.
